# currencycode

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

This package provides a dataset with country and currency names, as well as ISO codes.

## Installation

You can install the current version of `currencycode` from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("KKulma/currencycode")
```
## Example

```{r example}
library(currencycode)
## basic example code
data("currency_list")

str(currency_list)
```
